snippet.title: Magical Drop DX (マジカルドロップDX) Hard Mode Playthrough
snippet.description:
This is a mobile game ported to a Nintendo Switch via G-Mode Archives. It is a Japanese exclusive game, meaning you need to have a Japanese account to get this game, which is around $5. It's a barebones port of Magical Drop 2, the Famicom Port. Unfortunately, it does not support online play nor does it support multiplayer. The game, when released at the time, had different versions like Monster Farm 5 and Ragnarok Online.

Timestamps:

0:00 Intro
0:36 Fool
1:52 Star
2:42 Devil
3:49 Chariot
4:49 World


Gameplay was recorded from my Nintendo Switch.

#MagicalDrop #NintendoSwitch #RetroGaming

_________________________________________________________________
Don't forget to like, comment & share!
